name: Learn Chemistry!
description:
Each lesson has 2  slides  with images accompanying the words. The user can read through the lessons, or press the speak icon above and let the selected voice read for the user.

After the lesson, there is an option to practice the content, where the user is able to do the questions as many times as desired,  or do a timed quiz where gems can be earned. When the check, or submit button is pressed the answer box will turn red or green depending if the answer is correct, answers will show under each question, and will hide, when the hide answer button is clicked. The user can either select or type their answer. At the end of quiz mode, the amount of gems earned will be recapped, along with the bonus points for finishing with at least 7 points, before the 20 second mark. The user can switch through lesson stages using the navbar on the top.
